Today is 2025-06-09

You know what do I fight for? What is my end goal, is there one? I want to become nothing and everything. A king free to fly but changed to his throne. A god that rules everything but owns nothing. I want to become me.

Just Nothing Nothing NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING NOTHING

Is suffering a curse or a gift? Why do we people forget?
